channel.title: Solns on Intro to R
channel.description: Recent content in Solns on Intro to R

item.title: Solutions for PS 1
item.description: Basic Math and Logic with R # ---- SETUP x <- 18 r_is_cool <- 23 # 1 x + r_is_cool #2 x >= r_is_cool #3 x < r_is_cool & x + 10 > r_is_cool #4 sum(c(TRUE, TRUE, FALSE, TRUE)) Indexing Vectors # ---- SETUP what_the_vec <- c(seq.int(from = 8, to = 72, by = 2)) # 1 what_the_vec[14] ## [1] 34 # 2 new_vec <- what_the_vec[c(2, 8, 20)] # 3 new_vec[2] < new_vec[1] ## [1] FALSE # 4 new_vec2 <- new_vec[-1] Indexing Data Frames Section 1 # 1 dim(iris) # --- OR ---- str(iris) # str gives more info.
